Attributes.description: Vancouver as a laboratory for design at the architectural and urban scale with a focused view into how design is implicated in the social, political, and environmental transformation of the city.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: A score of 60% or higher in DES 301.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon, Start Time: 13:30, End Time: 17:00
